rows.label: tev065901_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev065901_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Da Zeulbe about the Ganglion.

rows.label: tev065901_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev065901_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Da Zeulbe if anything is troubling him.

rows.label: tev065901_SEL1011
rows.name:
Ask Da Zeulbe why the Ganglion pursue humans so
tenaciously.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Da Zeulbe about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Da Zeulbe about Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_SEL1041
rows.name: Ask Da Zeulbe about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hmph! What about them? That pathetic craven Luxaar
acts as though he matters in the organization,
but he's no better than any other Samaarian lackey.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0002
rows.name:
And he's certainly not a leader of character like our
Prince Jiarg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0003
rows.name:
His losses to you—combined with our betrayal—
ought to have the maggot writhing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0004
rows.name:
Were our men in better shape, we would go and
finish him off ourselves.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0005
rows.name:
And so we shall, once we are prepared.
We will infiltrate his lair and strike the life from him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0010
rows.name:
The Prone are determined to eradicate us.
Every day brings a new skirmish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0011
rows.name:
What they lack in wits they more than make up for in
toughness, and we have been struggling to thin their
numbers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0012
rows.name:
But you have fought many of them, have you not?
If you know any ways to dispatch them swiftly,
enlighten me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0017
rows.name:
I should ask you! Did you do something to incur their
never-ending wrath?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0018
rows.name:
They have always done whatever it takes to obtain the
things Samaar desires.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0019
rows.name:
But they were just lapdogs, and never showed any
particular investment in the work.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0020
rows.name:
All that changed when you entered the picture.
Without a single order from Samaar, the Ganglion
targeted you with every soldier they had.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0021
rows.name:
There is no precedent for this. Perhaps one of your
ancestors delivered insult to Luxaar's mother![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0026
rows.name:
My brother Naguth and sister Girhi and I have been
passing the hours hunting and destroying what
Ganglion we can find.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0027
rows.name:
Just the other day, we had a run-in with the Marnucks
gathered in the fortress above and made off with a
great number of weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0028
rows.name:
Heh. I never cared for the Marnucks.
They always acted far above their station![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0032
rows.name:
I have tested my mettle with some mighty opponents
since coming here. There was Ernest, the Contemplative
down in King's Falls...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0033
rows.name:
And I shall never forget my endless clash with Ludvik,
the Picky Eater, deep in the Keegan Ridge!
But none of these creatures were as strong as you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0034
rows.name:
Luxaar chose the wrong human to pick a fight with.
But let him agonize over that mistake in the next world![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0039
rows.name:
My brother Naguth and sister Girhi and I have been
passing the hours hunting and destroying what
Ganglion survivors we can find.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0040
rows.name:
Just the other day, we had a run-in with the Marnucks
gathered in the fortress above and made off with a
great number of weapons.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev065901_MSG0041
rows.name:
Heh. I never cared for the Marnucks.
They always acted far above their station![ST:wait ]
